Name: John
Text: I am here to interrogate you about the robbery last night

Name: John
Text: Where were you when the Musuem was robbed?

Name: Jack
Text: I was in the museum's art exhibit, looking at the mona lisa

Name: John
Text: There is no art exhbit at this museum! Now where were you?!

Name: Jack
Text: You'll have to find that out for yourself >:)
